title: Skin Ideas.
body:
For anyone here who plays/has played Starcraft or at least knows about it. I thought it would be cool to make a Kha'zix skin that is a reference to the Zerg. I mean he is all about evolution as are the Zerg so it kinda fits. He also has a lot of anatomical features similar to Hydralisks i.e his claws and spikes. The skins could be called Swarm Kha'zix or something like that. He would have brownish skin and have those mandible things that the Hydralisks have. It would probably be a 750 or 975 skin. 

As well as this, you could also make Swarm Cho'gath as an Ultralisk, Swarm Kog'maw as a Baneling, Swarm Rek'sai as a Roach. Queen of Blades Elise would be really cool as well because she has the arms on her back similar to Kerrigan's blades/wings.
